column1: Sec(cid:415)on 12B(1) and (2) of the Judicature Act provides as follows:

column2: “(1)   An appeal from any judgment, sentence or order pronounced at a trial held by

column3: a Permanent High Court at Bar under sec(cid:415)on 12A, shall be made within twenty
eight days from the pronouncement of such judgment, sentence or order to the
Supreme Court and shall be heard by a Bench of not less than ﬁve Judges of
that Court nominated by the Chief Jus(cid:415)ce.
